channel.title: OBC on Cr0w's Place
channel.description: Recent content in OBC on Cr0w's Place

item.title: Vehicle On-Board Charging Security Scanner
item.description: Topic: Vehicle On-Board Charging Security Scanner Autor: Pavel Khunt Supervisor: Thomas Sermpinis University: Czech Technical University in Prague Type: Masters Thesis in the department of Informatics Abstract This thesis focusses on the cybersecurity of electric vehicles, with an emphasis on security issues associated with the On-Board Charging (OBC) port. I have developed a security tool that enables the enumeration and partial evaluation of the publicly accessible OBC port on European electric vehicles.
